      Transforms BDG representation of variance components into BCK representation of variance components

      Transforms matrix of BDG variance components into matrix of DBM variance components

      Transforms matrix of BDG variance components into matrix of OR variance components

      Defines mod0StudyDesign and mod1StudyDesign fields with design for current study.

      Transform DBM representation of variance components into MS representation of variance components

      Transforms matrix of DBM variance components into matrix of OR variance components, or vice versa

      Scales/resizes parts of DBM variance components matrix according to number of normal/disease cases
      static double[][] genBCKCoeff(int NR, int N0, int N1)
      Determines the coefficient matrix for BCK variance components given a fully crossed study design
      static double[][] genBCKCoeff(int NR, int N0, int N1, double[] c)
      Determines the coefficient matrix for BCK variance components given a non-fully crossed study design

      • DBRecord

        public DBRecord(java.lang.String fname,
        java.lang.String[] componentStrings,
        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> desp,
        java.lang.String AUCstr)
        Constructor for creating a record from the internal database
        Parameters:
        fname - Filename of the database file
        componentStrings - Array of strings containing component information
        desp - Study info description
        AUCstr - AUCs in string form

      • DBRecord

        public DBRecord(InputFile input,
        int currMod0,
        int currMod1)
        Constructor for creating a record from raw study data input file
        Parameters:
        input - InputFile containing information about the study
        currMod0 - Which modality within the study we are using as Mod0
        currMod1 - Which modality within the study we are using as Mod1

      • DBRecord

        public DBRecord(double[] components,
        int whichComp,
        int Reader,
        int Normal,
        int Disease,
        double[] auc)
        Constructor for creating a record from manual input of components of variance
        Parameters:
        components - Components of variance entered from GUI
        whichComp - Specifies with decomposition of components are entered
        Reader - Number of readers
        Normal - Number of normal cases
        Disease - Number of disease cases
        auc - AUCs

        Returns:

      • getMod0StudyDesign

        public int[][][] getMod0StudyDesign()
        Gets the study design for modality 0
        Returns:
        Study design for modality 0, where first dimension is readers, second dimension is normal cases, and third dimension is disease cases. A one at a particular position indicates that the specific reader scored both the normal and disease case, and a zero indicates otherwise.

      • getMod1StudyDesign

        public int[][][] getMod1StudyDesign()
        Gets the study design for modality 1
        Returns:
        Study design for modality 1, where first dimension is readers, second dimension is normal cases, and third dimension is disease cases. A one at a particular position indicates that the specific reader scored both the normal and disease case, and a zero indicates otherwise.

      • checkStudyDesign

        private void checkStudyDesign()
        Defines mod0StudyDesign and mod1StudyDesign fields with design for current study. If study is fully crossed simply fills study design with 1's

      • generateDecompositions

        private void generateDecompositions()
        Derives all decompositions and coefficient matrices from predefined BDG components and experiment size

        public static double[][] DBM2MS(double[][] DBM,
                int NR,
                int N0,
                int N1)
        Transform DBM representation of variance components into MS representation of variance components
        Parameters:
        DBM - Matrix of DBM variance components
        NR - Number of readers
        N0 - Number of normal cases
        N1 - Number of disease cases
        Returns:
        Matrix of MS representation of variance components

      • genBDGCoeff

        public static double[][] genBDGCoeff(int NR,
                     int N0,
                     int N1,
                     int[][][] mod0design,
                     int[][][] mod1design)
        Determines the coefficient matrix for BDG variance components given a non-fully crossed study design
        Parameters:
        NR - Number of readers
        N0 - Number of normal cases
        N1 - Number of disease cases
        mod0design - Study design for modality 0
        mod1design - Study design for modality 1
        Returns:
        Matrix containing coefficients corresponding to BDG variance components

      • BDG2OR

        public double[][] BDG2OR(double[][] BDG,
                int NR,
                int N0,
                int N1)
        Transforms matrix of BDG variance components into matrix of OR variance components
        Parameters:
        BDG - Matrix of BDG variance components

        N0 - Number of normal cases
        N1 - Number of disease cases
        Returns:
        Matrix of OR variance components

      • DBM2OR

        public static double[][] DBM2OR(int index,
                double[][] in,
                int NR,
                int N0,
                int N1)
        Transforms matrix of DBM variance components into matrix of OR variance components, or vice versa
        Parameters:
        index - Whether the in[][] parameter is DBM or OR components
        in - Matrix of DBM or OR variance components
        NR - Number of readers
        N0 - Number of normal cases
        N1 - Number of disease cases
        Returns:
        Matrix of OR or DBM variance components

      • BCKresize

        public double[][] BCKresize(double[][] bck,
                   int newR,
                   int newN,
                   int newD)
        Resizes BCK variance components matrix, but actually currently does nothing
        Parameters:
        bck - BCK variance components matrix
        newR - Number of readers
        newN - Number of normal cases
        newD - Number of disease cases
        Returns:
        BCK variance components matrix

      • DBMresize

        public double[][] DBMresize(double[][] dbm,
                   int newR,
                   int newN,
                   int newD)
        Scales/resizes parts of DBM variance components matrix according to number of normal/disease cases
        Parameters:
        dbm - DBM variance components matrix
        newR - Number of readers
        newN - Number of normal cases
        newD - Number of disease cases
        Returns:
        Resized DBM variance components matrix
